description: The City Commercial Zone (C3) is a Zone established to meet most of the retail, commercial and services needs for the larger community, and may include offices and entertainment activities.
permitted_uses: Developments allowed in the C1 zone
conditional_uses: Garages and Car Repair - Grade E

lot_requirements.notes: Plots with size below 1000 m2 can follow C1 regulations

circulation.pedestrian_requirements: All attached and semi-detached buildings facing main commercial roads/BRT/wetland front/green corridors shall provide a continuous well designed and universally accessible arcade of no less than 5m. No parking allowed in front setback.

permitted: One building identification sign on tower
Awning signage: min 2.5m clearance, max 2.5 m²

parking.notes: Within 500m of BRT, minimum may be waived
